indicator_name: Volume of solid household waste removed
graph_title: Volume of solid household waste removed
goal_name: 11. Make cities and human settlements inclusive, safe, resilient and sustainable
target_name: 11.6 By 2030, reduce the adverse per capita environmental impact of cities, including by paying special attention to air quality and municipal and other waste management
indicator_name1: 11.6.1.1 Volume of solid household waste removed
organization_name: Department of Digital Development and Sustainable Development Statistics
definitions: The total volume of solid household waste exported, including products, materials and substances that have lost their consumer qualities due to their physical or moral deterioration, as well as solid household waste that arises in the process of human activity.
concepts: Street garbage (including garbage from unauthorized landfills and park waste) is garbage collected from the streets. This includes indicators for cleaning roads, underpasses, public transport parking lots, venues after meetings, demonstrations, entertainment shows, park waste, as well as the mass of waste collected and exported from unauthorized landfills."                    Waste from enterprises, institutions, organizations - these include waste that is regularly collected and exported: paper, cardboard, cans, bottles, etc., waste from restaurants and canteens, as well as waste from industrial enterprises that are similar in their properties, characteristics, or components to household waste if they are collected and exported together with household waste. waste (separate from industrial waste).     Household waste is the removed household garbage from residential buildings.Waste from markets -includes waste collected and exported from markets (food, non-food mixed, specialized (construction, automotive, etc.)."
rationale_interpretation: The main goal is to provide a measurement of the pressure exerted on the environment by all generated waste and its various categories (waste from various types of economic activities and households). The indicator of the intensity of waste generation is an indicator of the driving forces, as well as the response to anthropogenic activities.
data_sources: Data is being collected on Form No. 1-(Landscaping) "On landscaping and sanitary cleaning of cities and towns"
data_collection:
"Data collection is carried out by the National Statistical Committee of the Kyrgyz Republic on the basis of the state statistical reporting form No. 1-"Landscaping" on an annual basis from combinations of municipal enterprises and organizations engaged in the improvement of cities and towns, as well as aiyl okmotu and enterprises (special vehicles, special bases, road maintenance departments, etc.) with special machines and those who carry out work on the removal of household waste or on mechanized cleaning in urban and rural areas, regardless of the form of ownership 20- February to the territorial body of state statistics or to the Main Computing Center of the National Statistical Committee.
"
computation_methods: Data from section 5 of Form No. 1-(Landscaping)
quality_assurance: Logical and arithmetic control is performed
